name: AdresSoortCodelijst-to-AddressUse
description: Maps AddressType codes as found in HCIM AddressInformation (v1.0, 2017) to Address.use codes as found in FHIR STU3

target.comment: PST: Postal Address/Postadres. Postal addresses are marked in Address.type = postal
HP: Primary Home/Officieel adres. Use in conjunction with Address.extension:official = 'true' to mark as primary
PHYS: Visit Address/Woon-/verblijfadres. A communication address at a home. Use in conjunction with Address.type = 'physical'
HV: Vacation Home/Vakantie adres. Any temporary address.
